QuestData.Title: Remnants of Hope
QuestData.Description:
I studied the key you brought back from Torghast, $n.
It confirms that Jaina Proudmoore is still being held somewhere in the tower. However we do not know precisely where.
Countless souls are captive inside that wretched place. A few may be intact, but many are shattered and broken.
Take pity upon the remnants and free those you can. Perhaps they will be able to aid our search.
QuestData.LogDescription: See if you can gain any new insights from the trapped Soul Remnants in Torghast.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Oribos
QuestData.RewardText:
It is good that you saved those tortured souls, $n. A pity none could help our cause.
I must ponder our path forward. You will hear from me again when I know how to best proceed.
